description:
Just a short walk to Westfield Booragoon Shopping Centre , great schools and stunning Deep Water Point Reserve, this low-maintenance duplex offers convenience and ease in a covetable, family-friendly area.

Bright, airy and well maintained, find two bedrooms, one bathroom, a lock-up garage, covered alfresco and a large rear terrace. Set back from the street and surrounded by established greenery, this property offers secure living for busy people.

Throughout, enjoy easy-care timber laminate flooring or tiling, oyster ceiling lights and security screens, alongside air-conditioning in the living, kitchen and dining areas. A double-sized main bedroom facing a sweep of lawn at the front of the property boasts a ceiling fan and mirrored built-in robes, while bedroom two overlooks the privacy of the rear terrace.

Practical and functional, the kitchen includes an electric cooker, top and bottom cabinetry and ample bench space. Adjoining, a front-facing living/dining room is a sunny space for relaxing or entertaining, while a handy bathroom features a separate bath, shower and WC. Additionally, the separate laundry with direct outside access offers a tub and sizable storage.

Outside, a surprisingly large terrace provides residents with a versatile, quiet area to soak up the sun, cool off with an evening drink under the pergola or the opportunity to enhance the garden surrounds.

Out the front, come home to the single garage and further parking space on the driveway, neat garden beds, tall trees and a partially fenced lawn area.

Ideally located in close to Mount Pleasant Primary School, in the catchment for Applecross Senior High and a stroll to every imaginable store and eatery that nearby Westfield Booragoon has to offer - not to mention peaceful Wireless Hill Park on its doorstep and the nearby banks of the river - young families, downsizers or retirees can't go past this solid investment.

To secure it for yourself today, contact Agnes Lee on 0403 965 364.

Key Features Include:

• 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom
• Lock-up garage
• Paved rear terrace/covered alfresco
• Set back from leafy street
• Neat, well maintained
• Low maintenance flooring
• Bright interiors
• Separate laundry
• Air-conditioned main living area
• Ceiling fan and built-in robes in main bedroom
• Security window screens

Location Plus(approx. distances):

220m to Layman Park
350m to Bus stop 160 to the city & Canning Highway Train station
3km to Bull Creek Train station
400m to Mount Pleasant Bowling Club
850m to Westfield Booragoon Shopping Centre
900m to Mount Pleasant Primary School
1.1km to Applecross Senior High School
1.4km to Wireless Hill Park
1.5km to Riverside, Mount Pleasant
1.6km to IGA Mount Pleasant
11.5km to Perth CBD


Council Rates: $1,613.20 p.a.
Water Rates: $923.16 p.a.
Strata Levies: N/A
Floor\ Area: 71sqm


DISCLAIMER: We have in preparing this information used our best endeavours to ensure that the information contained herein is true and accurate, neither the Agent nor the client nor servants of both, guarantee their accuracy. Interested persons are advised to make their own enquiries and satisfy themselves in all respects. The particulars contained are not intended to form part of any contract.
